name: UIDocumentPickerViewController
desc: A view controller that provides access to documents or destinations outside your appâ€™s sandbox.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Returns an initialized object from data in a specified unarchiver.

items.name: init(forExporting: [URL])
items.desc: Creates and returns a document picker that can export the types of documents you specify.

items.name: init(forExporting: [URL], asCopy: Bool)
items.desc: Creates and returns a document picker that can export or copy the types of documents you specify.

items.name: init(forOpeningContentTypes: [UTType])
items.desc: Creates and returns a document picker that can open the types of documents you specify.

items.name: init(forOpeningContentTypes: [UTType], asCopy: Bool)
items.desc: Creates and returns a document picker that can open or copy the types of documents you specify.

items.name: var delegate: UIDocumentPickerDelegate?
items.desc: An object that acts as the delegate of the view controller.

items.name: protocol UIDocumentPickerDelegate
items.desc: A set of methods for tracking when the user selects a document or destination, or cancels the operation.

items.name: var allowsMultipleSelection: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select more than one document at a time.

items.name: var directoryURL: URL?
items.desc: The initial directory that the document picker displays.

items.name: var shouldShowFileExtensions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the browser always shows file extensions.
